title: Tesla Cybertruck lands on Mars and picks up the Curiosity rover on its 6' bed
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars!

title: Tesla FSD finally makes driving obsolete. After years of delay, Tesla Full Self Driving can drive you to work while you work, play, or sleep
tuit: The company was incorporated as Tesla Motors, Inc. on July 1, 2003, by Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning. Eberhard and Tarpenning served as CEO and CFO, respectively. Eberhard said he wanted to build a car manufacturer that is also a technology company, with its core technologies as the battery, the computer software, and the proprietary motor.

title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about.
